import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useParams, useHistory } from 'react-router' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' const ProductPage = () => { const { id } = useParams() const history = useHistory() function goBackHandle() { history.goBack() } const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector((state) => state.productDetails) const { loading, error, product } = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(id)) }, [dispatch]) return ( <> {loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} )} ) } export default ProductPage
